events.title: ECExperience
events.description: This week, Monday 15th through Friday 19th, we will be hosting some virtual social events within the ECE community! Join us on discord to stay up to date with events and see below for more info!

events.title: WECE x NWHM x iRobotics: On the Topic of Women's Issues
events.description: This event is a part of WECE's National Woman's History Month Series. Join us and iRobotics as we discuss the topic of women's issues!

events.title: March General Meeting
events.description: Join us during our March General Meeting and learn about what WECE has been up to!

events.title: Game Night with WiCys
events.description: Weâ€™re going to be playing CodeNames, where you will team up with some other people to uncover your team words, and Bomb Party, where you will use your vocabulary to play hot potato. Come join us for a great time and great people!

events.title: Lean in: Balanced Lifestyle
events.description: Join WECE for a conversation about balanced lifestyles and prioritization.

other_announcements.title: Resume Book
other_announcements.description: Looking for internships or full-time jobs? Add your resume to our WECE Resume database that we send to all our sponsors. Add it on this Google Form!

other_announcements.title: Alumni Database
other_announcements.description: If you are an alumni, we would love to stay in contact with you! If you would like to help WECE with professional development and help our current members, please fill out this form!

other_announcements.title: Join our WECE Slack Workspace
other_announcements.description: WECE uses Slack as a way to streamline communication between WECE members and committees, as well as a place for important announcements and upcoming events! Join our general channel here.
